text: Aap dekhen gay jin kay dilon mein beemari hai woh dor dor ker inn mein ghuss rahey hain aur kehtay hain kay humen khatra hai aisa na ho kay koi haadsa hum per parr jaye boht mumkin hai kay Allah Taalaa fatah dey dey. Ya apney pass say koi aur cheez laye phir to yeh apney dilon mein chupaee hui baaton per (bey tarah) naadim honey lagen gay
